title: Mass spectrum of element X - what can be concluded

content.question: The mass spectrum of element X is presented in the diagram above. Based on the spectrum, which of the following can be concluded about element X?

choices.label: X is a transition metal, and each peak represents an oxidation state of the metal.
The atomic mass of X is 90.
The atomic mass of X is between 90 and 92.

content.answer: The atomic mass of X is between 90 and 92.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
